name: Viro-Dash
description:
An endless runner game, where the player strives to achieve a high score by avoiding obstacles such as a person infected by the virus, infected surface. This game was made within 2 days by 3 dedicated gamers for a #africacomicadegamathon2020 game Jam! hope you enjoy the game!

Team Afro Ninjas!

Isheanesu Gwangwanyu - Zimbabwean Programmer
